name: Microwave Meatballs & Noodles with Salad and Warm Garlic Baguette
description: Heat-and-eat meatballs with noodles paired with a quick dressed salad and soft, warm garlic baguette. Zero chili heat and table-ready in under 15 minutes.
prep_steps: Set out 4 plates and 1 serving bowl.
Open the salad and have the salad dressing ready.
Slice the garlic baguette if it is not pre-sliced.
cook_steps: Microwave meatballs with noodles: Heat 4 individual trays one at a time per pack directions (typically 3–5 minutes each, stirring halfway). Keep covered to stay warm.
Microwave garlic baguette: Heat per pack directions until warm and soft (usually 1–2 minutes).
Toss salad: Add salad to the serving bowl and drizzle with salad dressing. Toss gently.
Plate: Divide meatballs with noodles onto plates. Add a portion of salad and slices of garlic baguette on the side. Serve.
